testcase.name: Search for an article and verify title and language dropdown - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia homepage........................................passed When I search for "Alan Turing".............................................passed Then the article title should be "Alan Turing"..............................passed And the language dropdown should be visible.................................passed

testcase.name: Confirm a term leads to a disambiguation page - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I open the article for "Mercury (disambiguation)".....................passed Then the disambiguation page title should be visible........................passed And the content should indicate it is a disambiguation page.................passed And at least one disambiguation link should be present......................passed

testcase.name: Switch article to another language - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia homepage........................................passed When I search for "Alan Turing".............................................passed And I switch the article language to "es"...................................passed Then I should be on the "es.wikipedia.org" domain...........................passed And the article title should be visible.....................................passed

testcase.name: Jump to footnotes for up to 5 references
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia homepage........................................passed When I search for "Alan Turing".............................................passed Then I should be able to click and view up to 5 valid footnotes.............passed

testcase.name: Search input and button are visible
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia homepage........................................passed Then the search input should be visible.....................................passed And the search button should be visible.....................................passed
